item.title: Change wep requirements [delta]
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“bloodmaniet, post:1, topic:303472”][quote author=I Yaa I link=topic=399708.msg2964724#msg2964724 date=1253477640]

hi, this is maybe a nub question ,but where do i change the weapon requirements? [delta]

wearing.java ill give u an example… if u search in anything any type of armour with this it will give u the required defence…

		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
			return 60;

return 60; is the defence lvl for dragon items. if u typed in rune it would look like this…

		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) {
			return 40;

There wasn’t a point of this because i already solved his problem you just reposted what i said with more spoonfeeding
[/quote]
Its more self explanatory though…[/quote]

People like you make this community look bad because of spoon feeding

Read full topic

[/quote]

wearing.java ill give u an example… if u search in anything any type of armour with this it will give u the required defence…

		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
			return 60;

return 60; is the defence lvl for dragon items. if u typed in rune it would look like this…

		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) {
